content: So I've been speaking to a few people about potentially being stakeholders and I realized that the existing page is missing some relevant info.
I was thinking @tmandry and that (a) we ought to think about what that is and (b) we ought to write an Inside Rust blog post with a "call for stakeholders"
I've been wanting to write a blog post giving an update on the vision process anyway, maybe we can do it all in one go?
